enhanced_description: Founded in 2018, Loop Health is India's first Health Assurance company that uniquely combines health insurance with comprehensive preventive healthcare services, aiming to keep employees and their families healthy while providing support when sick. The platform is designed to offer clear and understandable plans and benefits, alongside intuitive tools that save time and money. It provides access to excellent doctors focused on proactive health management to prevent hospitalization. Key offerings include unlimited 24/7 virtual primary healthcare consults, an Employee Assistance Program (EAP) with specialized chronic care programs for conditions like diabetes, hypertension, maternity, and elder care, and dedicated mental health counseling. Loop Health also assists companies in designing effective policy strategies to empower teams, boost productivity, and improve overall employee happiness.
